title: Win a £350 holiday voucher
text:

The reader who sends in the best entry will win a £350 travel voucher Send us your travel tips to win a holiday voucher Photo: Alamy 5:32PM BST 31 Jul 2015 Comments 
Do you have a favourite lake in Britain or abroad? It could be Lake Como in Italy, Lake Victoria in Africa or an example from South America. The reader who sends in the best entry will win a £350 travel voucher. 
DialAFlight 
DialAFlight (0844 556 6060; dialaflight.com ) is one of Britain’s top travel companies, offering tailor-made travel to destinations worldwide. Whether you are looking to fly to the Caribbean, long for a round-the-world adventure or are simply seeking a short break, DialAFlight’s 300-strong team can assist. No itinerary is too big or too complicated and DialAFlight prides itself on offering some of the best-priced air fares in the industry. It also offers deals on hotels, escorted tours and car hire. 
The prize 
Win a £350 travel voucher to spend on a holiday with DialAFlight. Choose from a range of trips and flights to worldwide destinations including Africa, Asia, Canada, the Caribbean, New Zealand, Australia, India and the US. 
Save £200 per person on a unique and boutique gastronomic tour of New Zealand , stopping off in wine areas including Hawkes Bay, Martinborough and Marlborough (pictured above) and tasting local food and vintages as you go. A 12-night tour with b&b accommodation (two sharing) costs from £3,195 per person including flights (Heathrow). Departures in October 2015. 
Get a taste of five-star luxury in the Turks and Caicos islands, with two free nights plus 10 per cent off at Parrot Cay . Set on a private island, the resort offers fine dining, a spa and sports in 1,000 unspoilt acres. Seven nights’ b&b (two sharing) costs from £1,756 per person and includes direct flights with British Airways from Gatwick. Valid for departures September 1-October 22. 
Submissions 
Email your entries (no more than 150 words, please) with your name, address and telephone number, by midnight on Wednesday August 5 2015, to yoursay@telegraph.co.uk. The £350 DialAFlight voucher can be used for travel departing within a year of the competition date, subject to availability. It is redeemable against one booking only (international travel only), made within six months of the competition date. The prize is non-transferable and no cash alternative is available. Only one prize voucher can be won per person per year. All bookings are subject to DialAFlight’s booking terms and conditions (see dialaflight.com). Other terms and conditions apply. For details, email yoursay@telegraph.co.uk.
